fields.name: context
fields.description:
Retrieve context information via Context ID which is provided by SLS
Various Scenarios:
1. LAUNCH_APP: Launch App from <Group> page
2. LAUNCH_ASSIGNMENT: Open <Assignment> page (from Assignment Listing page)
3. LAUNCH_TASK: Open <Task> page (from either Dashboard or Notification)

Context will expire in 10 seconds.

Errors:
1. Authorization header is invalid
2. Context does not exist
3. Context has expired

fields.name: user
fields.description:
Retrieve user information via user ID.

Errors:
1. Authorization header is invalid
2. User does not exist
3. User is neither Teacher nor Student
4. App is not installed for this User

fields.name: group
fields.description:
Retrieve subject group information via group UUID.

Errors:
1. Authorization header is invalid
2. Subject group does not exist
3. App is not installed for this group

fields.name: assignment
fields.description:
Retrieve assignment information via the assignment UUID.

Errors:
1. Authorization header is invalid
2. Assignment does not exist

fields.name: task
fields.description:
Retrieve task information via the task UUID.

Errors:
1. Authorization header is invalid
2. Task does not exist

fields.name: allGroups
fields.description:
Retrieve all groups installed to the App.

If changedSince is provided, only groups that changed since the time provided will be returned.
If schoolCode is provided, only groups in the school will be returned.

types.name: DateTime
types.description: Date and time format, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+08:00

fields.name: createAssignment
fields.description:
Creates an assignment for a subject group.
To assign the same quiz/activity/assessment to multiple Subject Groups, create an assignment for each subject group.

Errors:
1. App can only create assignments in subject groups it is installed to.

fields.name: updateAssignment
fields.description:
Updates the assignment: set fields to null if there are no changes to those assignment fields
Use this mutation to add or remove tasks associated to this assignment.

Errors:
1. App can only update assignments that it has created.
2. Once assignment has started, start and end dates cannot be changed.

fields.name: deleteAssignment
fields.description:
Delete assignment: assignment UUID is returned on successful deletion.

Errors:
1. App can only delete assignments that it has created.

fields.name: updateTask
fields.description: Update task status to reflect the task progress.

fields.name: createNotification
fields.description: Create notification for SLS user.

types.name: Context
types.description:
A context is provided to an App when a user launches the App from SLS.
The context provides information of the user who launches the App and from where it is launched.

fields.name: user
fields.description: Information of the user who launches the App

fields.name: event
fields.description: Information of where the App is launched

types.name: User
types.description: A user in the system, who is either a teacher or student.

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: Login Id of user, unique identifier of user.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of user.

fields.name: role
fields.description: Role of user, either Teacher or Student.

fields.name: school
fields.description: School of user

fields.name: email
fields.description: Email of user

fields.name: level
fields.description: Level that student is in, e.g. Secondary 1. Applicable to student only (Null for teacher).

fields.name: classSerialNo
fields.description: The unique number issued to each student in his/her class. Applicable to student only (Null for teacher).

fields.name: groups
fields.description:
Active (ie. current year) groups that user is in.
Only returns groups that have this app installed.
For Teacher, it is the Groups that this teacher is teaching
For Student, it is the Groups to which this student belongs

first: returns the first N groups, default to 20 if not specified.

types.name: Group
types.description: A group of teachers and students

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: UUID of the Group.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the Group used in VLE.

fields.name: code
fields.description: Identifier of Group for students and teachers, e.g. S1-A.

fields.name: subject
fields.description: Subject of the Group: e.g. English Language.

fields.name: school
fields.description: School of the Group

fields.name: active
fields.description: Whether the Group is currently active.

fields.name: level
fields.description: Level of the group: e.g. Secondary 1.

fields.name: teachers
fields.description: Teacher(s) who teaches this Group.

fields.name: students
fields.description:
Students who belong to this Group.

first: returns the first N students, default to 0 if not specified.
sortField: sorts students by the field, default to class serial no. if not specified.

fields.name: assignments
fields.description:
Assignments that have been assigned to this Group.

first: returns the first N assignments, default to 0 if not specified.

fields.name: lastUpdated
fields.description:
The date time when the Group last changed.
The field is updated when Group name, membership or status is changed

types.name: Assignment
types.description:
A piece of work that a teacher allocates/assigns to one or more students in a Group.
Each assignment has a collection of tasks, each corresponding to a student in the assignment.
It is not mandatory for all students in the Group to have a task for each assignment.

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: UUID of this assignment.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of assignment.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Assignment start date and time, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00.

fields.name: end
fields.description: Assignment end date and time, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00.

fields.name: createdBy
fields.description: User (ie. a teacher) who has created this assignment.

fields.name: modifiedBy
fields.description: User (ie. a teacher) who have made changes to this assignment.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of assignment, reflected in the SLS assignment page.

fields.name: group
fields.description: Subject group that this resource has been assigned to.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description:
List of tasks that have been generated.

first: returns the first N tasks, default to 0 if not specified.

fields.name: openInNewTab
fields.description:
Whether the assignment will launch in a new tab or within SLS's frame
True if new tab, False if otherwise.

types.name: Task
types.description:
A basic unit of work for one student.
Each task is part of an assignment, and tracks the progress of the student's work.

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: UUID of this task.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of assignment that this task is associated to.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Task start date and time (same as assignment), format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+08:00.

fields.name: end
fields.description: Task end date and time (same as assignment), format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+08:00.

fields.name: createdBy
fields.description: User (ie. teacher) who has created this task.

fields.name: assignee
fields.description: User (ie. student) assigned to this task.

fields.name: subject
fields.description: Subject of the task assigned.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of this task, default is NEW.

types.name: Notification
types.description:
A notification is a message for a specific SLS user, with a message to provide information.
The notification can be clickable if the eventType and eventTypeId is provided.
If both eventType and eventTypeId are not provided, the notification is not clickable.

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: UUID of the notification.

fields.name: message
fields.description: Notification message.

fields.name: scope
fields.description:
Scope in which notification is sent in the context from. Examples include global, school or subject group.
This is for future extensibility and GROUP should be selected.

fields.name: scopeId
fields.description: Id of scope (for NotificationScope of GROUP, this should be set to Group UUID).

fields.name: eventType
fields.description:
Context event type set in the Context when the user clicks and launches the notification.
eventType must be one of the enum values of EventType.

fields.name: eventTypeId
fields.description: Context event type id set in the Context when the user clicks and launches the notification

fields.name: recipient
fields.description: List of the recipient's (ie. SLS user) UUID.

fields.name: openInNewTab
fields.description:
Whether the notification, when clicked, will launch in a new tab or within SLS's frame
True if new tab, False if otherwise.

types.name: Event
types.description:
Event information when App is launched.
Event is generated when:
1. LAUNCH_APP: Launch App from <Group> page
2. LAUNCH_ASSIGNMENT: Open <Assignment> page (from Assignment Listing page)
3. LAUNCH_TASK: Open <Task> page (from either Dashboard or Notification)

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of event associated with the context.

fields.name: typeId
fields.description: UUID associated with the EventType, ie. Group / Assignment / Task

fields.name: launchKey
fields.description: The launchKey of event associated with the context.

fields.name: code
fields.description: School code

fields.name: name
fields.description: The full name of school

fields.name: endCursor
fields.description: The cursor value from the last node in the returned page.

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: Whether there is next page available.

types.name: AssignmentInput
types.description: Input type for mutations associated with assignment.

inputFields.name: start
inputFields.description: Assignment start date, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00

inputFields.name: end
inputFields.description: Assignment end date, format: ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME, e.g.,2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00

inputFields.name: createdBy
inputFields.description: User UUID (ie. a teacher) who has created this assignment.

inputFields.name: modifiedBy
inputFields.description: User UUID (ie. a teacher) who have made changes to this assignment.

inputFields.name: type
inputFields.description: Type of assignment, reflected in the SLS assignment page.

inputFields.name: assignees
inputFields.description:
User UUIDs of students who are assigned to this assignment.
On successful creation of assignment, corresponding tasks for each user will be created.

inputFields.name: groupUuid
inputFields.description: UUID of Group that the assignment is assigned to.

inputFields.name: openInNewTab
inputFields.description:
When Student/Teacher launch this assignment, it will be opened within SLS or new tab based on this setting.
If this value is not provided, it will default to application's setting.
Once assignment has started, this value can no longer be updated and error will be returned.

inputFields.name: message
inputFields.description: Notification message, maximum length of 300 characters.

inputFields.name: scope
inputFields.description:
Scope in which notification is sent in the context from. Examples include global, school or subject group.
This is for future extensibility and GROUP should be selected.

inputFields.name: scopeId
inputFields.description: Id of scope (for NotificationScope of GROUP, this should be set to Group UUID).

inputFields.name: eventType
inputFields.description:
Context event type set in the Context when the user clicks and launches the notification.
eventType must be one of the enum values of EventType.

inputFields.name: eventTypeId
inputFields.description: Context event type id set in the Context when the user clicks and launches the notification

inputFields.name: recipient
inputFields.description: List of the recipient's (ie. SLS user) UUID.

inputFields.name: openInNewTab
inputFields.description:
When Student/Teacher launch this notification, it will be opened within SLS or new tab based on this setting.
If this value is not provided, it will default to application's setting.

enumValues.name: NEW
enumValues.description: Student has not started on the task.

enumValues.name: IN_PROGRESS
enumValues.description: Student has started, but not completed the task.

enumValues.name: COMPLETED
enumValues.description: Student has completed the task.

enumValues.name: TEACHER
enumValues.description: Teacher

enumValues.name: STUDENT
enumValues.description: Student

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_1
enumValues.description: Primary 1

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_2
enumValues.description: Primary 2

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_3
enumValues.description: Primary 3

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_4
enumValues.description: Primary 4

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_5
enumValues.description: Primary 5

enumValues.name: PRIMARY_6
enumValues.description: Primary 6

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_1
enumValues.description: Secondary 1

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_2
enumValues.description: Secondary 2

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_3
enumValues.description: Secondary 3

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_4
enumValues.description: Secondary 4

enumValues.name: SECONDARY_5
enumValues.description: Secondary 5

enumValues.name: PRE_U_1
enumValues.description: Pre-U 1

enumValues.name: PRE_U_2
enumValues.description: Pre-U 2

enumValues.name: PRE_U_3
enumValues.description: Pre-U 3

enumValues.name: CLASS_SERIAL_NO
enumValues.description: Sort students by class serial number

enumValues.name: NAME
enumValues.description: Sort students by name

enumValues.name: LAUNCH_APP
enumValues.description: Launch application.

enumValues.name: LAUNCH_ASSIGNMENT
enumValues.description: Launch assignment. E.g. Teacher open assignment.

enumValues.name: LAUNCH_TASK
enumValues.description: Launch task. E.g. Student open task from dashboard.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Introspection defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: 'A list of all directives supported by this server.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: 'If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: An enum describing valid locations where a directive can be placed

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on queries.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on mutations.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fields.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment definitions.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment spreads.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on inline fragments.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a schema SDL definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a scalar SDL definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an object SDL definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field argument SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an interface SDL definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an union SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum value SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object field SDL definition.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if`'argument is true.

directives.name: defer
directives.description: This directive allows results to be deferred during execution
